Contact

Contact

The 13th Conference on Reversible Computation is organized by the Graduate School of Informatics, Nagoya University, Japan. If you have questions, please do not hesitate to contact us (info@reversible-computation.org).

Shoji Yuen
Nagoya University, Japan
General Chair
yuen[at]i.nagoya-u.ac.jp

Shigeru Yamashita
Ritsumeikan University, Japan
PC Chair
ger[at]cs.ritsumei.ac.jp

Tetsuo Yokoyama
Nanzan University, Japan
PC Chair
tyokoyama[at]acm.org
